resources.title: Settings
resources.locationInfoDescription: Set up politician information for your area.
resources.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete all settings?
resources.locationDescription: Set up your residential area information for citizenship interview questions that have different answers by state.
resources.yearlyChangingInfo: Political office information that changes annually.
resources.autoUpdateByElection: Automatically updated based on election results
resources.usageGuideText:
‚Ä¢ The configured information will be automatically used for questions with different answers by year/state.
‚Ä¢ President, Vice President, Speaker of the House, etc. are automatically updated.
‚Ä¢ Please enter Governor, Senator, and Representative information manually.
‚Ä¢ Accurate information can be found at senate.gov and house.gov.
resources.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app interface.
resources.languageChangeError: Failed to change language. Please try again.

location.stateNotFound: State information for this ZIP code could not be found.
location.addressSearchInstructions:
To find the correct representative, please enter your address on the official website.

After searching, come back and select from the options below.

ZIP code {zipCode} corresponds to multiple states: {states}

Would you like to set up your location information?

interview.locationSettingRequired: Some questions have different answers based on your location. Please set your state in Resources & Settings.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.aiModeDesc2: Natural and understands the meaning of answers.
instructions.aiModeDesc3: Supports real-time voice recognition and TTS.
instructions.regularModeDesc1: In environments with difficult data connection, uses built-in conversation tools.
instructions.regularModeDesc2: Can only check correct/incorrect for exact answers.
instructions.howToUseDesc1: Select AI/Regular mode with the top toggle.
instructions.howToUseDesc2: Control voice functions with microphone and speaker buttons.
instructions.howToUseDesc3: In AI mode, you can select voice tone.

aiInterview.listenAndAnswer: Listen to the question and answer
aiInterview.pressSpeakButtonToStart: Press the speak button to start speech recognition

resume.title: Resume Flashcards

flashcardSelection.title: Flashcard Mode Selection
flashcardSelection.description: Choose your preferred flashcard learning style to practice citizenship interview questions.

quizMode.title: Quiz Mode
quizMode.subtitle: Practice with multiple choice questions
quizMode.sequentialSubtitle: Study all 128 questions (2025) in order with bilingual support
quizMode.randomSubtitle: Study questions in random order for varied practice

subjectiveMode.title: Flashcard Mode
subjectiveMode.subtitle: Study questions with hidden answers
subjectiveMode.sequentialSubtitle: Study all 128 questions (2025) in order with hidden answers
subjectiveMode.randomSubtitle: Study questions in random order with hidden answers
subjectiveMode.hideAnswerSubtitle: Questions appear with answers hidden until you tap to reveal

disclaimer.text: This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by any government agency. It is an independent tool designed to help you prepare for the citizenship interview.
